alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong gusty winds will impact portions of eastern El Paso County through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking virga showers producing strong gusty winds over eastern El Paso county, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellicott around 430 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Yoder and Truckton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
